summary: An All-in-One collection of my followers
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#d5a6bd][size=6][font=Verdana][font=Comic Sans MS]Â [font=Verdana][color=#ffff00]A new version is available with all new textures and hairstyles[/color][/font][/font][/font][color=#ffff00].[/color]
[font=Verdana][color=#6d9eeb]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85832[/color][/font]

[u]Dragonborn Damsels[/u][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ea9999][size=4]This is an All-in-One of all of my current followers[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ea9999][size=4].[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ea9999][size=3]All of them[/size][/color][/font][color=#ea9999][size=3] [font=Comic Sans MS]are identical to the single versions with minor cosmetic alterations that I think you will notice on a couple of them.[/font][/size][/color]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4236/35003664414_213286861c_h.jpg[/img]
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e06666][size=5]Alyndra[/size][/color][/font][/u]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Race: Breton
Class: Combat Nightblade[/size][/color]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Location: Four Shields Tavern in Dragonbridge[/size][/color]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4290/35455919670_ba6cbbbcbe_h.jpg[/img]
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffe599][size=5]Anya[/size][/color][/font][/u]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Race: Nord
Class: Combat Ranger[/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8]
[size=3]Location: Riverwood(behind Sleeping Dragon Inn)
[/size][/color][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4240/35034143773_2a128fb0f5_h.jpg[/img]
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#b6d7a8][size=5]Bailey[/size][/color][/font][/u]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Race: Nord
Class: Combat Sorcerer[/size][/color][size=3]
[color=#9fc5e8]Location: Abandond shack past the Western Watch Tower[/color]
[/size][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4207/35455906430_d05d984f93_h.jpg[/img]
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#cc0000][size=5]Fyre[/size][/color][/font][/u]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Race: Redguard
Class: Combat Assassin[/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8]
[size=3]Location: War Maidens in Whiterun[/size][/color]

[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4285/35034147753_6b62762cbb_h.jpg[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=5][u]Karyssa[/u][color=#9fc5e8][size=3]
Race: Nord
Class: Combat Nightblade[/size][/color][color=#9fc5e8][/color][/size][/color][/font][color=#9fc5e8]
[size=3]Location: Riverwood(near entrance)[/size][/color]

[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4261/35455925120_b0d2b531ec_h.jpg[/img]
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#e69138][size=5]Lyzabeth[/size][/color][/font][/u]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Race: Nord
Class: Combat 2H Warrior
Location: Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun[/size][/color]

[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4215/35711977681_8d3abe2b88_h.jpg[/img]

[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ead1dc][size=5]Randi[/size][/color][/font][/u]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Race: Breton
Class: Combat Rogue
Location: Riverwood(around the sawmill)
[/size][/color]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4242/35003683794_8747cfed23_h.jpg[/img]
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Zoe[/size][/color][/font][/u]
[color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Race: Wood-Elf
Class: Combat Ranger
Locaton:Jorrvaskr in Whiterun[/size][/color]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffd966][size=4]All of them use [color=#93c47d]Zoe's body[/color] found here: [color=#00ffff]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55156/?[/color][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ff00][size=3]Optional CBBE and SeveNBase bodies available.[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffe599]Other bodies will come later.[/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ea9999][size=3]Zoe's body and the SeveNBase version require compatible skeleton[/size][/color][/font].

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffd966][size=4]They all have the same stats,combat skills,inventory,spells and clothing/armor as the originals.[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#dd7e6b][size=5]
Installation: Use [color=#e06666]NMM[/color] or download manually [color=#93c47d]Skyrim/Data[/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]Please uncheck single .esp's before loading game or you will have double followers.[/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff]Credits[/color]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#dd7e6b][size=5][size=5][color=#6d9eeb][size=4][color=#dd7e6b]zacki[/color]-Zoe's body bbp-tbbp-hdt
[color=#6aa84f]Hvergelmir[/color]-Brows
[color=#00ffff]hellosanta[/color]-SG hairs
[color=#a64d79]LogRaam[/color]-Eyes of Beauty
[color=#9fc5e8]Natilde[/color]-Creating Standalone Followers
[color=#ead1dc]Bethesda[/color]- Skyrim[/size][/color][/size][color=#6d9eeb]
[color=#ffd966][size=4]
Please refer to my single mods for information on the followers.[/size][/color]
[color=#b4a7d6]Thanks for all the downloads and endorsements on my single mods.
Again all comments and screenshots are welcome.


[/color][/color][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#dd7e6b][size=5][color=#6d9eeb][color=#b4a7d6][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]This mod can also be used in Skyrim Special Edition.[/size][/color][/font][/color][/color]

[/size][/color][/font][/center]
author: lewbob
